Package pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AppInvites.AppInviteListener
    Listener to be notified of asynchronous App Invite events, like invitation receipt or sending success.
    SignIn.SignInListener
    Listener to be notified of asynchronous Sign In events, like sign in or sign out,
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppInvites
    Interface to the App Invites API, which can be used to send Email and/or SMS invitations to a user's contacts.
    AppInvitesReferralReceiver
    Standard implementation of a Broadcast Receiver that is used to detect installation from the Play Store.
    GacFragment
    Fragment to manage the lifecycle of a GoogleApiClient in a generic way so that it can be used with different combinations of GacModule at runtime.
    GacModule
    Simplified version of a GoogleApiClient "API".
    SignIn
    Interface to the Google Sign In API, which can be used to determine the users identity.
